PHRASE.LANG: A gorgeous high definition three dimensional adaptation of the award-winning puzzle game, Cogs is a steampunk style puzzle game where players build machines from sliding tiles. Cogs Home will challenge players to construct a wide variety of 3D machines from sliding tiles -- from flying contraptions to rocketships, and offers multiple rewards for players, based on their skill. [#Legal]

Cogs est un casse-tête dans le style steampunk où les joueurs construisent des machines marrantes avec des tuiles coulissantes. L'Accueil de Cogs met les joueurs au challenge de construire une grande variété de machines 3D à partir de tuiles coulissantes – allant de l'engins volants à la fusée, et il offre aux joueurs toute une série de récompenses en fonction de leurs compétences. [#Legal]

Eine fantastische dreidimensionale HD-Adaption des preisgekrönten Puzzle-Spiels. Cogs ist ein im Steampunk-Stil gehaltenes Puzzle-Spiel, in welchem der Spieler Maschinen aus sich bewegenden Plättchen zusammenbaut. Cogs Home fordert den Spieler heraus, eine große Vielfalt von 3D-Maschinen aus sich bewegenden Plättchen zu konstruieren - von fliegenden merkwürdigen Geräten bis hin zu Raketenschiffen. Der Spieler erhält, je nach seinen Fähigkeiten, ein vielzahl von Belohnungen. [#Legal]

Cogs è un puzzle game in stile steampunk in cui i giocatori devono creare degli strani macchinari facendo scorrere delle piastre metalliche con varie configurazioni. Cogs Home sfida i giocatori a costruire una gran varietà di macchinari in 3D, dai più strani aggeggi volanti alle navi spaziali, facendo scorrere delle piastre metalliche: questo gioco offre anche diversi premi, assegnati in base alle capacità dell’utente. [#Legal]

Cogs es un juego de rompecabezas de estilo retrofuturista en el que los jugadores construyen máquinas a partir de baldosas deslizantes. Cogs Home desafiará los jugadores a construir una amplia variedad de máquinas en 3D con baldosas deslizantes, desde artilugios voladores hasta naves espaciales, y ofrece varias recompensas para sus jugadores en función de sus destrezas. [#Legal]
This is the single player version of cogs [#Legal]
코그는 스팀펑크 스타일의 퍼즐 게임입니다. 움직이는 타일을 사용하여 기계장치를 만들어 내야만 합니다! 아름다운 고해상도의 삼차원 퍼즐 게임을 만나 보십시오. 하늘을 나는 비행물체에서 로켓비행정까지, 다양항 기계장치를 만들 수 있으며 플레이어의 실력에 따른 멋진 리워드 역시 제공합니다. [#Legal]

A gorgeous high definition three dimensional adaptation of the award-winning puzzle game, Cogs is a steampunk style puzzle game where players build machines from sliding tiles. Cogs Home will challenge players to construct a wide variety of 3D machines from sliding tiles -- from flying contraptions to rocketships, and offers multiple rewards for players, based on their skill. [#Legal]
這是一個華麗的高清三維空間並可以讓您獲獎的益智遊戲，「齒輪王」是一個蒸汽機風格的益智遊戲，讓玩家滑動瓷磚以連接機器齒輪。「齒輪王」遊戲將挑戰玩家以滑動瓷磚的方式完成一個多元3D機器。從飛行器到火箭船，並根據玩家的技能提供多種獎品道具。[#Legal]
這是一個華麗的高清三維空間並可以讓您獲獎的益智遊戲，「齒輪王」是一個蒸汽機風格的益智遊戲，讓玩家滑動瓷磚以連接機器齒輪。「齒輪王」遊戲將挑戰玩家以滑動瓷磚的方式完成一個多元3D機器。從飛行器到火箭船，並根據玩家的技能提供多種獎品道具。[#Legal]

A gorgeous high definition three dimensional adaptation of the award-winning puzzle game, Cogs is a steampunk style puzzle game where players build machines from sliding tiles. Cogs Home will challenge players to construct a wide variety of 3D machines from sliding tiles -- from flying contraptions to rocketships, and offers multiple rewards for players, based on their skill. [#Legal]

HOW TO PLAY 
 
Finish puzzles in few 
moves and a short 
time to score big! 
 
Press [TRIANGLE] for controls.

Achever les casse- 
têtes en quelques 
mouvements et en 
peu de temps pour 
gagner la partie ! 
Appuyer sur [TRIANGLE] 
pour les contrôles.

ANLEITUNG 
Mit wenigen Zügen 
und in kürzester Zeit 
das Puzzle zu 
beenden bringt die 
meisten Punkte! 
 [TRIANGLE] Steuerelemente

ISTRUZIONI 
Completa gli schemi 
con poche mosse e 
più veloc che 
puoi per ottenere 
più punti! Premi [TRIANGLE] 
per gestire i controlli.

INSTRUCCIONES 
¡Termina los 
rompecabezas con 
pocas acciones y en 
el menor tiempo 
posible! 
Los Controles [TRIANGLE]

플레이 방법 
 
최소한의 이동과 짧은 
시간으로 높은 점수를 
획득하세요! 
 
[TRIANGLE]을 눌러 조작 방법 확인

HOW TO PLAY 
 
Finish puzzles in few 
moves and a short 
time to score big! 
 
Press [TRIANGLE] for controls.

如何遊玩 
 
在數次移動及短時間內 
完成關卡。 
是時候取得高分數了！ 
 
按[TRIANGLE]來顯示操作方法。

如何遊玩 
 
在數次移動及短時間內 
完成關卡。 
是時候取得高分數了！ 
 
按[TRIANGLE]來顯示操作方法。

HOW TO PLAY 
 
Finish puzzles in few 
moves and a short 
time to score big! 
 
Press [TRIANGLE] for controls.

CONTROLS 
 [UP][DOWN][LEFT][RIGHT] [LEFTSTICK] Move cursor 
 [CROSS] Select tile 
 [L1][R1] [RIGHTSTICK] Rotate puzzle 
 --- 
Press [CROSS] to play

CONTRÔLES 
 [UP][DOWN][LEFT][RIGHT] Déplacer curseur 
 [CROSS] Sélectionner tuile 
 [L1][R1] [RIGHTSTICK] Faire tourner 
le casse-tête. 
 
 [CROSS] Jouer

STEUERELEMENTE 
 
 [UP][DOWN][LEFT][RIGHT] [LEFTSTICK] bewegt Cursor 
 [CROSS] Plättchen wählen 
 [L1][R1] [RIGHTSTICK] Puzzle rotieren 
 
Drücke [CROSS] zum Spielen

CONTROLLI 
 
 [UP][DOWN][LEFT][RIGHT] [LEFTSTICK] Muovi il cursore 
 [CROSS] Seleziona 
 [L1][R1] [RIGHTSTICK] Ruota 
 
Premi [CROSS] per giocare

CONTROLES 
 [UP][DOWN][LEFT][RIGHT] [LEFTSTICK] Mover el cursor 
 [CROSS] Seleccionar pieza 
 [L1][R1] [RIGHTSTICK] Girar 
rompecabezas 
 
 [CROSS] Jugar

조작 방법 
 
 [UP][DOWN][LEFT][RIGHT] [LEFTSTICK] 커서 이동 
 [ACCEPT] 타일 선택 
 [L1][R1] [RIGHTSTICK] 퍼즐 회전 
 
[ACCEPT]을 눌러 플레이

CONTROLS 
 [UP][DOWN][LEFT][RIGHT] [LEFTSTICK] Move cursor 
 [ACCEPT] Select tile 
 [L1][R1] [RIGHTSTICK] Rotate puzzle 
 --- 
Press [ACCEPT] to play

操作 
 
 [UP][DOWN][LEFT][RIGHT] [LEFTSTICK] 移動游標 
 [ACCEPT] 選擇瓷磚 
 [L1][R1] [RIGHTSTICK] 轉動關卡 
 
按 [ACCEPT] 遊玩

操作 
 
 [UP][DOWN][LEFT][RIGHT] [LEFTSTICK] 移動游標 
 [ACCEPT] 選擇瓷磚 
 [L1][R1] [RIGHTSTICK] 轉動關卡 
 
按 [ACCEPT] 遊玩

CONTROLS 
 [UP][DOWN][LEFT][RIGHT] [LEFTSTICK] Move cursor 
 [CROSS] Select tile 
 [L1][R1] [RIGHTSTICK] Rotate puzzle 
 --- 
Press [CROSS] to play
